epics.title: Global Search Bar
epics.description: Implement a global search bar in the header to enhance user navigation and content discovery.

stories.title: Add global search bar to header
stories.description: Implement a search bar in the header with a prominent search icon that expands to an input field.
acceptance_criteria: Search bar is present in the header
Search icon expands to input field
Keyboard shortcut Cmd/Ctrl + K focuses the search bar
Placeholder text reads 'Search projects, tasks, files...'
Recent searches dropdown shows last 5 searches
Clear button appears when text is entered

agent_context.goal: Enhance user navigation by providing a quick access search feature.
self_check: Is the search bar accessible for screen readers?
Does the keyboard shortcut work on all supported browsers?

epics.title: Search Functionality
epics.description: Implement search functionality to provide instant and categorized search results.

stories.title: Implement instant search results
stories.description: Display search results instantly as the user types, with categorized sections and highlighted matches.
acceptance_criteria: Search begins after 2 characters are entered
Input is debounced by 200ms
Loading indicator is shown during search
Results are displayed in categorized sections
Matching text is highlighted in results

agent_context.goal: Provide users with real-time search results to enhance efficiency.
self_check: Are results appearing within the expected time frame?
Is the loading indicator visible during search?

stories.title: Implement search scope across content types
stories.description: Ensure the search functionality covers all specified content types with accurate categorization.
acceptance_criteria: Search includes projects by name and description
Search includes tasks by title, description, and comments
Search includes files by filename and extracted text content
Search includes people by name, email, and role
Search includes comments by text and author
Show count per category in results

agent_context.goal: Enable comprehensive search across various content types for better user experience.
self_check: Are all content types being indexed correctly?
Is the categorization accurate and intuitive?

epics.title: Search Enhancements
epics.description: Enhance search capabilities with filters, advanced syntax, and a detailed results page.

stories.title: Implement filters and facets for search results
stories.description: Allow users to refine search results using various filters and facets.
acceptance_criteria: Filter by content type with checkboxes
Filter by date range (created, modified)
Filter by owner/creator
Filter by status for tasks (open, closed)
Filter by tags/labels
Filters update results instantly

agent_context.goal: Provide users with the ability to refine search results for more precise information retrieval.
self_check: Do filters update results without delay?
Are all filter options intuitive and user-friendly?

stories.title: Support advanced search syntax
stories.description: Implement support for advanced search operators for power users.
acceptance_criteria: Support for 'exact phrase' matches
Support for type filtering with 'type:task'
Support for owner filtering with 'owner:@username'
Support for date filters with 'created:>2024-01-01'
Support for status filters with 'is:unread'
Support for excluding terms with '-keyword'
Support for Boolean OR operations

agent_context.goal: Empower advanced users with flexible search options to tailor their queries.
self_check: Are all advanced operators functioning as expected?
Is the syntax intuitive for power users?

stories.title: Develop search results page
stories.description: Create a comprehensive search results page with pagination, sorting, and export options.
acceptance_criteria: Full results page available at /search
All filters visible in sidebar
Results are paginated with 20 per page
Sort options include relevance, date, and name
Ability to save search as filter/view
Export results to CSV

agent_context.goal: Provide a detailed and user-friendly interface for viewing and managing search results.
self_check: Is the pagination smooth and intuitive?
Are all sorting options functioning correctly?

epics.title: Search Analytics
epics.description: Implement analytics to track and improve search feature usage and performance.

stories.title: Implement search analytics tracking
stories.description: Track and analyze search behavior to improve the feature.
acceptance_criteria: Log all search queries in an anonymized manner
Track click-through rate per result
Identify zero-result queries
Surface trending searches

agent_context.goal: Gather insights on search usage to enhance feature effectiveness and user satisfaction.
self_check: Is the anonymization method compliant with privacy standards?
Are all tracked metrics accurate and useful?
